text:
- Poor staff attitude.
- Poor service.
- Food quality and quantity is just like any other zhi char stall.
- No cutlery but it is ok with me.
- Ordered and paid $1.5($3 in total for 2x eggs) for a fried egg each to both rice. Came home only to find out there is none. Called the stall and they requested for a photo. Your cook and staff left it out and you have the cheek to demand otherwise. I will take it as giving $3, doing charity to your business. $3 is a darn “big horse chariot wheel” to you.

2025: chilli crab is good. Requested for less spicy. Crab meat is solid. 2 for $60. Super!

2024: Chilli crab is really good quality. Big and meaty. 2 for $70. 3 for $100

Hor fun is normal. 3 star

Our go-to restaurant!
Lip smacking varieties for the local experiences you need!
Some of our favourite dishes are
Seafood fried rice
Seafood mee goreng
Prawn omelette
Sting ray
Chilli crab
Lemon chicken
Tom yum soup
Cereal prawns!

Had a great meal here. Service was prompt and friendly. Ask for their recommendations. It'll never go wrong. Fish soup, chilli crab, fried chicken wings, sweet and sour pork were executed well. Will definitely go back again!
Decent food at typical Singapore prices. Small cereal prawns $20 and only got 4 prawns was a disappointment,  chicken was tasteless, sweet potato leaves over cooked. Pleasant atmosphere.
